text:
Unable to build with --enable-rule=SHARED_CORE with gcc 3.3.2.

Error:

/opt/tools/mdss/dev/2.8/bin/gcc  -I./os/unix -I./include   -DSOLARIS2=280
-DUSE_EXPAT -I./lib/expat-lite -fPIC -DSHARED_CORE -g -O3 `./apaci` 
-L/opt/tools/mdss/dev/2.8/lib -R/opt/tools/mdss/dev/2.8/lib  \
      -o libhttpd.ep -DSHARED_CORE_TIESTATIC main/http_main.c \
	  -L. -lhttpd  -lsocket -lnsl -lpthread
/opt/tools/mdss/dev/2.8/bin/ld: libhttpd.ep: hidden symbol `__lshrdi3' in
/opt/tools/mdss/dev/2.8/lib/gcc-lib/sparc-sun-solaris2.8/3.3.2/libgcc.a(_lshrdi3.oS)
is referenced by DSO
collect2: ld returned 1 exit status
gmake[2]: *** [libhttpd.ep] Error 1
gmake[2]: Leaving directory `/opt/tools/mdss/dev/2.8/tools/apache_1.3.31/src'
gmake[1]: *** [build-std] Error 2
gmake[1]: Leaving directory `/opt/tools/mdss/dev/2.8/tools/apache_1.3.31'
gmake: *** [build] Error 2

Retried; getting same error with 1.29.I'll mirror to the gcc mailing list in the
case this is a gcc bugg..
creator: esp5@pge.com
